data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Esquerré, Damien, Núñez, Herman, Scolaro, José Alejandro (2013): Liolaemus carlosgarini and Liolaemus riodamas (Squamata: Liolaemidae), two new species of lizards lacking precloacal pores, from Andean areas of central Chile. Zootaxa 3619 (4): 428-452, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3619.4.2
